quotes.text: The onus is on you to demonstrate greatness, and then you'll get the opportunities. It's not the other way around.
quotes.author: Richard Hamming

quotes.text: Genius is 99% perspiration and 1% inspiration.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: The way you lead your life from day to day you prepare yourself for success or you don't. And when the lightning strikes, you're either ready or you're not. It misses you, or hits you.
quotes.author: Richard Hamming

quotes.text: Chance favors the prepared mind.
quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

quotes.text: Se fossi stato un buon figlio quando tu eri in vita, non avrei svoltato la mia vita.
quotes.author: Emanuele Frasca

quotes.text: Thinking small is a self-fulfilling prophecy.
Get rewarded for the effort, not the results.
To study means offsetting the natural forgetting of new information.
quotes.author: Andrew Huberman

quotes.text: Don't get it confused, it's ninety percent grind, ten percent talent.
quotes.author: Central Cee

quotes.text: A good life was never a comfortable life.
Define a life vision. Break it down to 3-years goals, to yearly goals, to monthly tasks, to daily tasks.
I can have fun after my career, but right now is grind time.
quotes.author: Terence Crawford

quotes.text: You say our relationship is childish, you are my baby so I agree.
quotes.author: Central Cee

quotes.text: Comfort is a really dangerous thing.
I see tasks in life as missions in a videogame: if they are there it's because they can be achieved, you just need to figure out how. It might be in hardcore mode, but still doable.
When I win, I don't feel euphoria. It's just on to the next. When I lose, there's when I feel it.
quotes.author: Anthony Joshua

quotes.text: Humans peak motivation when working on tasks that are right on the edge of their current abilities. Not too hard. Not too easy. Just right.
I coulda been laid up with shorty, fuck it, the grind more important.
quotes.author: Central Cee

quotes.text: I haven't failed 1,000 times. I've just found 1,000 ways that won't work. I have found 1,000 ways to not light up an incandescent light bulb.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: The pain is compulsory, suffering is optional
quotes.author: Dave

quotes.text: Stare insieme è l'arte di risolvere i problemi che non ho da solo.
quotes.author: Jacopo Lazzarini

quotes.text: My greatness is not in achievig the goal, it is in keep on trying.
I'm not addicted to gaming, I'm addicted to the feeling of leveling up.
Outwork your self-doubt.
I wanna drain my soul of every bit of person I am.
quotes.author: David Goggins

quotes.text: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishments.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: My personal life ain't right, but I'm putting this first so I won't lose focus.
quotes.author: Central Cee

quotes.text: Sognare è meglio che averlo, anche il milione d'euro.
quotes.author: Vieri Igor Traxler

quotes.text: It appears, then, that people might be comparing their realistic offline selves to the idealized online selves of others, which may be detrimental for well-being and self-evaluations.
quotes.author: E. A. Vogel et al.
quotes.source: Social Comparison, Social Media, and Self-Esteem

quotes.text: Pressure builds diamonds.
If you want to hide a tree, plant it in the forest
quotes.author: Jewish wisdom

quotes.text: Artists must suffer, the result is better.
quotes.author: Lars von Trier

quotes.text: Should know that you can't rush greatness, but you're too impatient.
quotes.author: Central Cee

quotes.text: If there's no test that you can apply that would allow you to tell the difference, then there is no difference.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.text: The universe rewards calculated risk and passion.
quotes.author: Joe Rogan

quotes.text: OGs need to get back to reality, I don't wanna hear about back in the days
quotes.author: Central Cee

quotes.text: Good ideas are often times born from bad ideas.
quotes.author: Andrew Bustamante

quotes.text: People, when they meet you, they put you in a bin […] if you want to avoid being put in a particular bin, just show some kind characteristics that bin you in another way […] you have to be in a bin, just choose the bin.
quotes.author: Andrew Bustamante

quotes.text: Every man is not only responsible for everything it does, but also for everything anyone else does […] is what you receive back proportional to what you deliver? […] people certainly respond to you in kind with how you treat them […] the world you experience is defined by the way you live it.
The more you act out the proposition that (the world) is good, the better it gets.
quotes.author: Lex Fridman

quotes.text: Scale back the dragon till you find one that's conquerable and moves you forward. And it'll give you a little bit of goal.
quotes.author: Jordan Peterson

quotes.text: Your destiny is to be found in what bothers you.
quotes.author: Jordan Peterson

quotes.text: Why would I dwell on the past? Without that, maybe this wouldn't have happened.
quotes.author: Central Cee

quotes.text: Arranging your life so that you have interesting experiences.
quotes.author: Jimmy Wales

quotes.text: if you don't respect yourself, you go looking for signs of disrespect in others.
quotes.author: Jimmy Wales

quotes.text: You can't just join a conversation, you must advance that conversation. Add something new to it. Take it in a different direction. Engage in unusual, insightful ways.
You can say money don't buy happiness only once you've made it.
Everybody was a nobody before they were a somebody.
It's what you do in the dark that puts you in the light.
Never give up on something that you can't go a day without thinking about.
It's going to happen because I'm going to make it happen.
97% of people who quit are employed by the 3% that never gave up.
Work until you no longer have to introduce yourself.
It's not bragging if it's true.
I don't have dreams, I have goals.
A mother loves you, but a grandmother is always on your side.
Camera con vista dall'edificio più alto, come posso pretenderla se non do gas al massimo.
quotes.author: Gabriele Pastero

quotes.text: Boredom is when none of the options you have available to you, appeal to you
Raising our awareness of fortunate events can also make us happier, because it allows us to feel gratitude.

If you perceive an outcome to be uncertain, you're less likely to invest effort in it, which further decreases your chances of success. So it is a useful delusion to believe you're in full control of your destiny.
La bellezza arresta il moto.
quotes.author: San Tommaso D'Aquino

quotes.text: Le persone eccezionali manifestano la propria vocazione nel modo più lampante e forse da questo dipende il fascino che esse esercitano.
quotes.author: James Hilman

quotes.text: L'amore per me è stima perché la bellezza stanca.
quotes.author: Mario Molinari

quotes.text: Non amo che le rose che non colsi
quotes.author: Guido Gozzano

quotes.text: Shoot for the moon, even if you miss you're landing on a star.
Healthy people wish many things, unhealthy people only one.
The opposite of love is not anger or hate, it's apathy.
Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
Education isn't meant to be binged, and because of this, I'll probably remind you quite a bit to take breaks.
quotes.author: Andrej Karpathy

quotes.text: I own an obscenely expensive black sport car that does 0 to 140 in six seconds, do you think that i fantasize about driving an obscenely expensive black sport car that does 0 to 140 in six seconds?
Whatever you feel matters only to you, whatever you do about it matters to the world.
